critique: The document is a formal order regarding the reinstatement of Mrs. Marie E. Summers to a position in the Government Printing Office. The language is formal and bureaucratic. There is a slight sense of joy and gratitude conveyed in the document due to the reinstatement of Mrs. Summers, but it is very mild. There is also a hint of sadness due to the mention of the death of Mr. Robert W. Summers. There is no anger, fear, disgust, or surprise conveyed in the document.
